@dev Retrieves the balance of `account` at the time `snapshotId` was created.

CRD().details: This function return the id of CRD token

returns._0: tokenId it is the ID of CRD token

balanceOfAt(address,uint256,uint256).details: Retrieves the balance of `account` at the time `snapshotId` was created.

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Transfers `amount` tokens of token type `id` from `from` to `to`.

params.amount: this is the amount to transfer
params.data: This is the data or note for transfer
params.id: `from` must have a balance of tokens of type `id` of at least `amount`.
params.to: It is the token receivers address
